# predict.skin — Skincare & Dermatology Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for skincare & dermatology. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.skin is a prediction market platform focused on skincare & dermatology. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Skincare & Dermatology prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.skin)
- [Markets — Active skincare & dermatology prediction markets](https://predict.skin#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, skincare & dermatology, betting, odds, forecast, predict.skin
